page.title: 14WINSTANLEY-A New Estate
page.content:
The aim of the original pre-war plan for the development of the area,the "{WINSTANLEY NEIGHBOURHOOD UNIT}",was to house 40,000 people in a region which was then mainly farms and woods with some mine-workings,including open -cast sites.
After the land had been allowed to settle development began in 1958 and continued through the 60's, 70's and into the 80's.
Today Winstanley is still growing and is a popular residential estate.
A retired gentleman who has lived in the area for over 60 years states:"The changes are welcome.I prefer social life to solitude every time."
